source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select count(1) from activityLogs with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(datetime as date) < Cast(getdate()-35 as date)

Select count(1) from businessdata.activityLogs with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(CreatedDateas date) <= Cast(getdate()-60 as date)

Select * from activityLogs with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(datetime as date) <= Cast(getdate()-11 as date)

Select * from MemberActivityLog with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(CreatedDate as date) <= Cast(getdate()-11 as date)

Select count(1) from activityLogs with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(datetime as date) <= Cast(getdate()-45 as date)

Select count(1) from Adaptive.ActivityMonitorLog with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(CreatedDate as date) < Cast(getdate()-60 as date)

FileName.defaultValue: Nextly CCM Credit Card Account Details*.csv
